social_work: Engaged as an active volunteer, donated blood in camps, organized workshops.

projects.name: Womens Health and Awareness Platform
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Womens Health and Awareness Platform with Integrated features such as period tracking, PCOS prediction, real-time data display, awareness pages, exercise recommendations, and a user-generated blogs section

projects.name: Zenith Productivity Enhancing Website
projects.description: A web application designed to enhance productivity and study habits using scientific techniques. Features include the Pomodoro Technique, task management, motivational tools, and the Eisenhower Matrix for effective prioritization. Integrates the Gemini model for personalized learning, note-taking, and seamless collaboration through notes sharing.

projects.name: Global Life Expectancy Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed life expectancy (2000-2015) for 193 countries, emphasizing immunization impact. Used Python (pandas, scikit-learn), statistical modeling, and visualization for insights. Aiming for targeted interventions to enhance global population health.

projects.name: MetAssistant - Metro System Assistant using Data Structures
projects.description: A metro route tracking system enabling users to input station names, codes, and numbers to discover the metro route between two stations. The system encompasses multiple metro lines and offers the display of station interchanges along the route.

experiences.description: Developed Widget For displaying the latest Music Album released Under Homestack Verticals Team
